com.miviclin.droidengine2d.graphics.mesh

Class GraphicsBatchRenderer<M extends Material>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.miviclin.droidengine2d.graphics.mesh.GraphicsBatchRenderer<M>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RectangleBatchRenderer

    public abstract class GraphicsBatchRenderer<M extends Material>
extends Object
    Base class for graphics batches.
    Author:
    Miguel Vicente Linares

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GraphicsBatchRenderer(int maxBatchSize)
      Constructor.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void begin()
      Prepares this object for rendering.
      void checkInBeginEndPair()
      Checks if begin() was called but end() has not been called yet.
      void end()
      Renders all the remaining elements in this batch.
      int getBatchCapacity()
      Returns the capacity of this batch.
      int getBatchSize()
      Returns the number of elements in this batch.
      BlendingOptions getCurrentBatchBlendingOptions()
      Returns the BlendingOptions that should be used to render the current batch.
      M getCurrentMaterial()
      Returns the current material of this batch.
      BlendingOptions getNextBatchBlendingOptions()
      Returns the BlendingOptions that should be used to render the next batch.
      ShaderProgram getShaderProgram()
      Returns the ShaderProgram.
      boolean isForceDraw()
      Returns if the forceDraw flag is set to true or false.
      boolean isInBeginEndPair()
      Returns true if begin() was called but end() has not been called yet.
      void setCurrentMaterial(M material)
      Sets the current material of this batch and updates the current and next BlendingOptions if needed.
      abstract void setupShaderProgram()
      Sets up the ShaderProgram.

    • Method Detail

      • setupShaderProgram

        public abstract void setupShaderProgram()
        Sets up the ShaderProgram.

      • begin

        public final void begin()
        Prepares this object for rendering.
        This method must be called before end().
        See Also:
        beginDraw()

      • end

        public final void end()
        Renders all the remaining elements in this batch.
        This method must be called after begin().

      • isInBeginEndPair

        public boolean isInBeginEndPair()
        Returns true if begin() was called but end() has not been called yet.
        Returns:
        true if begin() was called but end() has not been called yet, false otherwise.

      • checkInBeginEndPair

        public void checkInBeginEndPair()
        Checks if begin() was called but end() has not been called yet. If the result is false, throws an exception.

      • getCurrentBatchBlendingOptions

        public BlendingOptions getCurrentBatchBlendingOptions()
        Returns the BlendingOptions that should be used to render the current batch.

        Returns:

      • setCurrentMaterial

        public void setCurrentMaterial(M material)
        Sets the current material of this batch and updates the current and next BlendingOptions if needed.
        Parameters:
        material - Material.

      • isForceDraw

        public boolean isForceDraw()
        Returns if the forceDraw flag is set to true or false.
        Returns:
        true or false

      • getBatchSize

        Returns the number of elements in this batch.
        Returns:

      • getBatchCapacity

        public int getBatchCapacity()
        Returns the capacity of this batch.
        Returns:
        Max number of elements thar this batch is able to render in one draw call.
